name: Party Time With Joe
description:
Play in fullscreen

Move using WASD and Space to jump

R to restart level

Platformer to collect your friends and then have a party!!

Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2021

Credit To:

Tilemap: https://barf-vader.itch.io/simple-tilemap

Font: https://www.dafont.com/baby-party.font
